projects.title: Shorty
projects.description: A URL Shortner written with Python 3.9 using Flask and SQLite module. Shorten URLs with ease.

projects.title: Artona
projects.description:
A Safari Extension made for iOS 15. It allows you to customize your favorite websites and
                                make it your own.
projects.imageDescription: A screenshot of Color options available in Artona

projects.title: Facial Recognition
projects.description:
FacialRecognition is an app written with Python 3.9 using Tkinter, OpenCV and Face
                                Recognition modules. It lets you populate facial encoding data from couple of images and
                                helps you identify anyone who's in the dataset.

projects.title: SwiftWidgets
projects.description: A Swift package with custom Flutter like widgets for SwiftUI.

projects.title: SFIcons
projects.description: A collection of all the SF Symbols into an easy to use swift package.
projects.imageDescription: A screenshot of SFIcons in use

projects.title: Connect4
projects.description: A simple Connect4 Game made using Java and JavaFX.

projects.title: Schedulify
projects.description: A class schedule app written in Swift and SwiftUI.

projects.title: Muse
projects.description:
A social networking site backend handler, that creates a simple way of authenticating a
                                user.

projects.title: Jule
projects.description: A webcrawler that crawls a predefined list of sites to find helpul information and links.

projects.title: SubConverter
projects.description:
A simple subtitle converter, that provides you with an easy to use method call, and can
                                be adapted for
                                any platform.

projects.title: FoodApp
projects.description:
A food delievery app made using Flutter framework. This is just a Ui, and doesn't
                                actually communicate
                                with any api yet.
